name: Many Sidebars
author: Edir Pedro

sections.description: When you use WordPress as a CMS, it’s very common to create so many sidebars that when you try to manipulate each one on the Widgets page, you get totally crazy trying to drag and drop the widgets to the right sidebar. Because of this problem I did the Many Sidebars plugin that simply organize all your sidebars and let you work on each one solely.
sections.installation:
1. Upload many-sidebars folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Widgets page to enjoy
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Bugfix, WP 4.4 changed widget heading from H3 to H2.

1.0.1

  • Bugfix when open the sidebar panel and drag widgets to it.

1.0

  • First release.
